name: Mediathek Downloader
description: Mit dem Plugin kann man die Mediatheken der öffentlich-rechtlichen Sender in Deutschland durchsuchen und Inhalte herunterladen. Für die suche wird die MediathekViewWeb-API verwendet. Der Videos werden direkt über die Original-URLs der Sender heruntergeladen. Es können Abos anglegt werden um z.B. Serien automatisch herunterzuladen.
overview: Sucht und lädt Inhalte aus den Mediatheken über die MediathekViewWeb-API.

## v0.3.0.0 - Automated Cleanup, Enhanced Subscriptions & Refactoring

  This release brings significant improvements to subscription management, file maintenance, and the underlying architecture of the plugin.

 ### 🚀 New Features

   * Automated `.strm` Cleanup: A new scheduled task scans your download directories for invalid .strm files. It safely deletes files only if the stream URL is definitively gone (404/410), keeping your library clean without
     risking accidental deletions during server outages.
   * Subscription Management: You can now enable or disable individual subscriptions without deleting them.
   * Smart Duplicate Detection: The plugin now scans the target directory for existing episodes (SxxExx or absolute numbering) to prevent redundant downloads.
   * Library Scan Toggle: Added an option to choose whether the Jellyfin library should be scanned automatically after a download finishes.
   * Enhanced Extras Handling: Better detection and handling of non-episode content (Trailers, Interviews) with options to save them as separate .strm files.

 ### 🐛 Bug Fixes & Improvements

   * Language Detection: Fixed an issue where short words in titles were misinterpret as language codes.
   * API Stability: Fixed API response mapping (replaced missing Total field with QueryInfo).

 ### 🛠 Technical Improvements

   * Major Refactoring: The download logic has been split into SubscriptionProcessor and DownloadManager for better stability and maintainability.
   * Frontend Modernization: Refactored the configuration page to use ES6 classes and safer DOM manipulation.
   * Grouped Downloads: Video and subtitle downloads are now grouped into a single logical job.
